paper.title: A method for business sequential data prediction
paper.abstract: The paper describes the process and new methodology of a hybrid prediction system for business sequential data i.e. debt portfolio appraisal. Conducting the local area competence data mining approach, repayment values are predicted by means of combination of various data mining techniques. The methods include clustering of references, model selection and enrichment of input variables with prediction outputs from preceding periods. Experimental studies concern the method's configuration influence on its general performance such as number of distinct predictors and number of competence areas.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是预测债务组合的还款价值，这属于投资组合管理的范畴，因为它涉及对债务资产的表现进行评估和预测。
